name: Biscuit Party
description:
Biscuit Party is a nervous and dynamic Multiplayer Local Game. 

Using tiles, try to connect the center to your ennemies base before the end of the timer. At the end, the one with the shortest path loses. 

You can play as 4 players only. 

This game was created in 48h during the Global Game Jam 2023. 

TEAM :
